mapper.select: SELECT /* Offer.getOfferCuInfoList */ OFFER_SYS_CD , OFFER_TYPE_CD , TMPL_CUPN_NO , TMPL_CUPN_NO_USE_YN FROM CM_CAMPAIGN_OFFER WHERE 1=1 AND CAMPAIGNCODE = #{CAMPAIGNCODE} AND TMPL_CUPN_NO_USE_YN IN ('Y', 'N')

SELECT DISTINCT /* Offer.getOfferPnInfo */ T3.CAMPAIGN_SK AS CAMPAIGNID , T3.CAMPAIGN_CD AS CAMPAIGNCODE , T3.CAMPAIGN_NM AS CAMPAIGNNAME , T3.MARKETING_CELL_SK AS CELLID , T3.MARKETING_CELL_NM AS CELLNAME , T3.MARKETING_CELL_CD AS CELLCODE , T3.COMMUNICATION_SK AS COMMUNICATION_SK , T3.OFFER_CONTENT_ID AS OFFER_CONTENT_ID , T3.OFFER_CONTENT_NM AS OFFER_CONTENT_NM , T3.OFFER_SYS_CD , T2.OFFER_TYPE_CD , T2.OFFER_ID AS OFFERLISTID , (SELECT CODE_NAME FROM CM_CODE_DTL WHERE COMM_CODE_ID = T2.OFFER_TYPE_CD AND CODE_ID = T2.OFFER_DETAIL_CD) AS OFFERNAME , T1.DISP_NAME , T1.OFFER_AMT , T1.CREATE_ID , (SELECT USER_NAME FROM CM_USER WHERE ID = T1.CREATE_ID) CREATE_NM , T1.CREATE_DT , T1.UPDATE_ID , (SELECT USER_NAME FROM CM_USER WHERE ID = T1.UPDATE_ID) UPDATE_NM , T1.UPDATE_DT AS UPDATE_DT , T1.TMPL_CUPN_NO AS TMPL_CUPN_NO , T1.TMPL_CUPN_NO_USE_YN AS TMPL_CUPN_NO_USE_YN , T1.OFFER_APLY_CD AS OFFER_APLY_CD , T1.PROD_RECOM_CD AS PROD_RECOM_CD FROM ( SELECT CAMPAIGN_SK , CAMPAIGN_CD , CAMPAIGN_NM , MARKETING_CELL_SK , MARKETING_CELL_NM , MARKETING_CELL_CD , MAX(COMMUNICATION_SK) AS COMMUNICATION_SK , MAX(OFFER_SYS_CD) AS OFFER_SYS_CD , MAX(OFFER_CONTENT_ID) AS OFFER_CONTENT_ID , MAX(OFFER_CONTENT_NM) AS OFFER_CONTENT_NM FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT T6.CAMPAIGN_SK , T6.CAMPAIGN_CD , T6.CAMPAIGN_NM , T6.MARKETING_CELL_SK , T6.MARKETING_CELL_NM , T6.MARKETING_CELL_CD , T6.COMMUNICATION_SK , CASE WHEN UPPER(T5.CHAR_EXT_COLUMN_NM) = 'OFFER_SYS_CD' THEN T5.CHAR_UDF_VAL ELSE NULL END AS OFFER_SYS_CD , CASE WHEN UPPER(T7.NUM_EXT_COLUMN_NM) = 'OFFER_CONTENT_ID' THEN T7.NUM_UDF_VAL ELSE NULL END AS OFFER_CONTENT_ID , CASE WHEN UPPER(T5.CHAR_EXT_COLUMN_NM) = 'OFFER_CONTENT_NM' THEN T5.CHAR_UDF_VAL ELSE NULL END AS OFFER_CONTENT_NM FROM CI_CELL_PACKAGE T6 LEFT JOIN CI_COMMUNICATION_CHAR_UDF T5 ON T6.COMMUNICATION_SK = T5.COMMUNICATION_SK LEFT JOIN CI_COMMUNICATION_NUM_UDF T7 ON T6.COMMUNICATION_SK = T7.COMMUNICATION_SK WHERE 1=1 AND T6.CAMPAIGN_SK = #{CAMPAIGNID} AND T5.COMMUNICATION_SK IN ( SELECT COMMUNICATION_SK FROM CI_COMMUNICATION WHERE DELETED_FLG = 'N' ) ) GROUP BY CAMPAIGN_SK , CAMPAIGN_CD , CAMPAIGN_NM , MARKETING_CELL_SK , MARKETING_CELL_NM , MARKETING_CELL_CD ) T3 LEFT JOIN CM_CAMPAIGN_CONTENTS_OFFERLIST T2 ON T3.OFFER_CONTENT_ID = T2.OFFER_CONTENT_ID LEFT JOIN CM_CAMPAIGN_OFFER T1 ON T3.MARKETING_CELL_SK = T1.CELLID AND T2.OFFER_ID = T1.OFFERID AND T3.OFFER_CONTENT_ID = T1.OFFER_CONTENT_ID WHERE 1=1 AND T3.MARKETING_CELL_SK = #{CELLID} AND T2.OFFER_ID = #{OFFERID}
mapper.update: MERGE INTO CM_CAMPAIGN_OFFER /* Offer.setOfferPn */ USING DUAL ON ( 1=1 AND CELLID = #{CELLID} AND OFFERID = #{OFFERID} ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET DISP_NAME = TRIM(#{DISP_NAME}) , OFFER_AMT = TRIM(#{OFFER_AMT}) , OFFER_APLY_CD = TRIM(#{OFFER_APLY_CD}) , PROD_RECOM_CD = TRIM(#{PROD_RECOM_CD}) , UPDATE_ID = TRIM(#{UPDATE_ID}) , UPDATE_DT = SYSDATE WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( CELLID , OFFERID , OFFER_TYPE_CD , OFFER_SYS_CD , DISP_NAME , OFFER_AMT , OFFER_APLY_CD , PROD_RECOM_CD , CAMPAIGNCODE , FLOWCHARTID , CREATE_ID , CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( TRIM(#{CELLID}) , TRIM(#{OFFERID}) , TRIM(#{OFFER_TYPE_CD}) , TRIM(#{OFFER_SYS_CD}) , TRIM(#{DISP_NAME}) , TRIM(#{OFFER_AMT}) , TRIM(#{OFFER_APLY_CD}) , TRIM(#{PROD_RECOM_CD}) , TRIM(#{CAMPAIGNCODE}) , TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(TRIM(#{CAMPAIGNCODE}),5)) , TRIM(#{CREATE_ID}) , SYSDATE )
